title: #640 - Rikki Rockett
description:
Rikki Rockett, the drummer for the band Poison and a Brazilian jiu-jitsu black belt, returns to the Church of What's Happening Now to join Joey Diaz and Lee Syatt live in studio. 

This podcast is brought to you by:

Stamps.com -  Use code JOEY for a 4 week trial which includes postage and a digital scale. Go to Stamps.com, click on the Radio Microphone at the top of the homepage and type in JOEY.
Onnit.com. Use Promo code CHURCH for a 10% discount at checkout.
 
Recorded live on 12/02/2018.
